HotelElement.Name: Marriott Riverside at the Convention Center

Description.Text: Facilities The holiday village offers guests a total of 292 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a newspaper stand, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Guests can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. Features include a fridge, a tea/coffee station, internet access and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a hot tub. A hairdryer is also available. The complex offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The complex offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to travellers. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The holiday village offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Breakfast can be booked.
